name: StandX DUSD
description: StandX is a Perps DEX that enables users to trade with yield-earning margins. DUSD is StandX’s first product - a yield-bearing stablecoin. Through DUSD, StandX allows users to generate returns on their margin balances. DUSD is a yield-bearing stablecoin designed to deliver competitive returns. It is a fully collateralized, yield-bearing stablecoin that auto-distributes real yield to holders—no staking needed—offering secure, effortless returns with seamless DeFi integration.
